column5: Maybe this should be in classifieds but here goes ..  Looking for a set of forks for a 90 Yamaha dirt bike ( bent forks , long storey , involving a large tree) new or used.  Any suggestions or dealer reccomendations ?  can travel to  purchase anywhere from GTA  to Parry sound to Ottawa , Kingston  TB
going to ..I know of a couple in GTA any others you are aware of ? TB
It's been a few years... ahem, 20 or so... I bought a good front end from T.O. Cycle. I don't know if they're still in business. -Brian
Zdeno cycle in Kitchener on Victoria st. is our local bike wreckers.

+1 Zdeno's will have whatever part you need for any bike, of any year.  It's amazing the amount of stuff they have.  Not cheap though.  Here's a list for a bunch of other wreckers for you to shop around (wreckers near bottom of list)  http://www.gtamotorcycle.com/vbforum/showthread.php?t=1045
